definition: to use up/to exhaust/to probe to the bottom/limit/end
poor/destitute/to use up/to exhaust/thoroughly/extremely/(coll.) persistently and pointlessly
to use up/to exhaust/to end/to finish/to the utmost/exhausted/finished/to the limit (of sth)/all/entirely
to the greatest extent/(when used before a noun of location) furthest or extreme/to be within the limits of/to give priority to

sentences.english: He devoted his whole life to writing the book on LuXun.
sentences.chinese: 他穷尽一生的时间写那本研究鲁迅的书。

sentences.english: The volumes and the appetite for transactions appeared endless.
sentences.chinese: 股票交易量和交易的胃口似乎无穷尽。

sentences.english: E.g. Amitabha Buddha (Amituofo) has infinite life for helping countless beings in Pure Land.
sentences.chinese: 无量佛陀在极乐世界无穷尽的生命普度众生。

sentences.english: It can be said that the possibilities of design and construction is far away from been exhausted.
sentences.chinese: 集装箱建筑的设计和建造可能性还远未穷尽。

sentences.english: I did finally finish Infinite Jest! And the whole thing required only three bottles of Advil.
sentences.chinese: 我读完了《无穷尽的笑话》，只需要三瓶雅维布洛芬。

sentences.english: It teaches that all is not, has not been, exhausted.
sentences.chinese: 它教训我们道，一切都不曾，也从来不会被穷尽。

sentences.english: Saito sensei devoted every moment of his life to preserving the Founder's techniques.
sentences.chinese: 斋藤守宏老师穷尽一生保留开祖的技法。

sentences.english: He exhausts their number and with them his chances of life.
sentences.chinese: 他只想穷尽这些女人，并且与它们穷尽生活的机遇。

sentences.english: He exhausts their number and with them his chances of life.
sentences.chinese: 他只想穷尽这些女人，并且与它们穷尽生活的机遇。

sentences.english: It makes sense to re-use materials rather than using up resources.
sentences.chinese: 这让重复使用材质比穷尽资源更理性。

sentences.english: The wisdom of crowds isn't an oxymoron.
sentences.chinese: 群众的智慧是无穷尽的。

sentences.english: Is his mercy clean gone for ever? doth his promise fail for evermore ?
sentences.chinese: 难道他的慈爱永远穷尽，他的应许世世废弃吗？

sentences.english: The cornfields stretched southward as far as the eye could see.
sentences.chinese: 麦田向南不断延绵直至人眼的穷尽。

sentences.english: Like him, he drains something and is constantly on the move.
sentences.chinese: 像后者一样，他穷尽某种事物，并不断运动着。

sentences.english: The problems it addresses are boundless and the solutions almost as myriad.
sentences.chinese: 它解决无限的问题，解决方案也几乎没有穷尽。

sentences.english: It brings us untold miseries and damage.
sentences.chinese: 它带给我们无穷尽的痛苦和损失。

definition: to do all one can/to give all one has
to use up/to exhaust/to end/to finish/to the utmost/exhausted/finished/to the limit (of sth)/all/entirely
to the greatest extent/(when used before a noun of location) furthest or extreme/to be within the limits of/to give priority to
vast as the open sea (idiom); fig. extensive (library)
to demand payment/to extort/to trace/to seek/to pursue/to explore
